questions.question: The first flag is located at the manual page of the current running shell when you connected to the server.
The second flag is in the form: current-logged-in-user@kernel-release version.
What is the most recently ran command?
What is the main editor in the machine?
Who has the full permission of /secret.txt? (Full = Read + Write + Execute) (flag format: name@type (example: workgroup@owner))
